Naomi

GW1: 265
GW2:255

title: The Fast Growing World Of #FatRunners
body:
The Fast Growing World Of #FatRunners
There’s a quiet revolution taking place within the sport (or at least online) that’s challenging the aesthetic expectations of runners and embracing the body-positivity movement  —  #fatrunner.

October 1, 2018 at 03:51PM
via Digg

summary: thanks. i'll look into that. i haven't heard of it. my anxiety is at it's worst in a long time. i really need something so...
question: thanks. i'll look into that. i haven't heard of it. my anxiety is at it's worst in a long time. i really need something so hopefully that'll work out for me. i tried to go to a free therapist through the state but you have to have a diagnosis from a doctor. while they diagnosed me in the hospital when i had a panic attack after being roofied, they didn't write anything or print it out. they just told us i had generalized anxiety disorder.
answer: Yeah I have been diagnosed with social and generalized anxiety as well as depression. I just haven’t gone back to anyone.I know its more than just that, I feel crazy so I need to go back. But better help sounds ideal imo (especially for me). Like you pay weekly but can talk to the therapist via text, phone call, email and video chat any time you need. Like you know how therapy is a set day and aren’t really there if you’re in the midst of a panic attack etc? Like you can go see them on Monday and on Wednesday have a panic attack and need someone to talk to but you have to wait for your session again on Monday. With better help you can talk to your therapist on Monday and if you need them again in Wednesday you can talk to them on that day too and I believe its a paid weekly thing and not per session.

With better help you can talk to your therapist on Monday and if you need them again in Wednesday you can talk to them on that day too and I believe its a paid weekly thing and not per session.

Like you can go see them on Monday and on Wednesday have a panic attack and need someone to talk to but you have to wait for your session again on Monday. With better help you can talk to your therapist on Monday and if you need them again in Wednesday you can talk to them on that day too and I believe its a paid weekly thing and not per session.

summary: Weight Loss: Drinking more Water Helps
title: Weight Loss: Drinking more Water Helps
body:
Weight Loss: Drinking more Water Helps

 WATER

There are a lot of people who are doing water therapy in order to lose weight in a natural way. For a long time, it has been believed that drinking water can help you lose weight. We all know that the goal is to drink at least eight glasses of water per day however, in reality, most of us can’t really reach that volume. Some people drink more than the average while other people drink…

title: When is pain bad? via /r/Fitness
body:
Hi team - long time lurker here. Female 25 5'11".

Mods feel free to delete if this is repeating what too many others have said.

I’ve been doing 5x5 SL for about 10 weeks and it’s going well except I’m beginning to get sore and tight erector spinae muscles during and after squatting.

I’ve read a few posts here of people saying they’ve had the same issues and people suggest stretching etc. Which I do. But I’m also wondering when is pain a BAD thing and when is it just DOMS or signs of a hard workout ?

I’ve been getting sore/tight ES muscles during my squats and it freaks me out because I’m starting to think I’m load my back incorrectly.

I’ve had my form checked a few times and there’s nothing wrong except occasionally I don’t mean forward enough

Wondering if anyone else has had the same issues and if it’s just my body getting used to the lift?



Submitted October 01, 2018 at 04:27AM by infochimp
via reddit https://ift.tt/2Qogfpo

summary:
▶️ Just remember that the simplest things in life we can be grateful for. 

▶️ Whether that’s just waking up to see that day,...
caption:
▶️ Just remember that the simplest things in life we can be grateful for.

▶️ Whether that’s just waking up to see that day, spending time with family or friends, or just appreciating everything that we currently have.

▶️ Gratitude is the best attitude but it’s also a feeling.

▶️ Choose to feel grateful, thankful and appreciative.

blog.name: allthingstantra
blog.title: All Things Tantra
blog.description: I will be sharing some of the insights and things that I have personally learned through my tantra journey so far. My goal is also to provide valuable resources about all things tantra such as interesting and valuable articles about all things tantra by various authors, as well as reviews of different resources, such as courses, retreats, events, books, schools and practitioners. I would also like to widen and expand my own knowledge and understanding of tantra.

summary: Best Detox and Cleanse for Your Body – The Yogic Way
title: Best Detox and Cleanse for Your Body – The Yogic Way
body:
Earlier this year, I wrote an article where I describe some of the best detox and cleanse methods in a tantric yogic way.

Read this article here: http://bit.ly/2MNwVEr

The methods that I describe in the article are:

  • Tongue scraping
  • Nasal cleanse
  • Eye rinse
  • Oil pulling
  • Intenstinal wash

What is your favourite body cleanse method?

If you have anything to ask about the methods I wrote about, please leave a comment, I will be more than happy to discuss and help however I can.
Read this article here: http://bit.ly/2MNwVEr

summary: Former Berkeley professor wins Nobel Prize in Medicine
title: Former Berkeley professor wins Nobel Prize in Medicine
body:
Former Berkeley professor wins Nobel Prize in Medicine

[ad_1]

BERKELEY, Calif. (KGO) —

A former Berkeley professor has received the 2018 Nobel Prize in Medicine for discovering a new cancer treatment.

James Allison received the award along with Tasuku Honjo. The two men discovered a cancer treatment called immune checkpoint theory. It uses the body’s immune system to attack cancer cells.

Allison first started this research in a lab at Berkeley in…

View On WordPress

summary: Alan wants to turn health insurance into software-as-a-service  Ok, my headline is a bit provocative, but it’s kind of true....
caption:
Alan wants to turn health insurance into software-as-a-service

 Ok, my headline is a bit provocative, but it’s kind of true. French startup Alan is launching today a brand new full-stack health insurance company in France. Compared to existing products, Alan wants to make the experience much sleeker. Here’s how it works. The company just raised $13 million (€12 million) from CNP Assurances, Power Financial, Partech Ventures and business angels. Read More

http://shares.ly/eRc

blog.description: Physical Therapist and Fitness Consultant. I bring you some Amazing Bodybuilding exercises along with high protein tips and workouts for health and weight loss

title: Plan For Success
body:
If your training is uninteresting, uneventful, and foreseeable, you have no one at fault yet yourself. Exercise programming is a critical component of being successful in the health club and reaching your figure objectives. Just like anything else in life, you should be prepared and established up a solid, well-thought-out plan prior to you go right into the health club. Simply flying by the seat of your trousers will not get you very far for very long.

Even though you have to set framework to your exercise for the day, it should be in pencil so that changes could be made on the fly. You have no suggestion just how a certain weight or workout is going to feel till you enter the gym as well as get after it. There should be area for changes because the very best plan worldwide is only like the modifications that you make.

There are a myriad of aspects that you have to consider when configuring workouts. A lot of are straight associated with healing since you can educate harder than everyone else in the gym, but if you’re educating beyond your recovery capabilities, you’ll not only lose time and not expand but you could open yourself approximately injury as well.

I’ve created five major points in order to help streamline exercise shows. Plainly, there are other aspects of programs like nutrition, supplementation, as well as cardio, however these five factors are specifically focused on training.

Train to obtain big! See just what Steve Kuclo provides for size as well as toughness.

1 FREQUENCY

This is incredibly vital due to the fact that you need to arrange your training overview to make sure that you educate often sufficient to obtain the most growth yet not so regularly that you aren’t able to recover and also grow from workout to exercise. If you are not sure as to how well you recover, area your workouts additionally far from each various other, and afterwards as the weeks pass you can try out minimizing the time between exercises. Remember that your recovery time will fluctuate based upon variables in your life like stress, exactly how literally requiring your work is, etc. Always err on the side of having even more time between exercises. Even more healing nearly constantly indicates you will certainly advance better.

2 PRIORITIZE

Weaker muscular tissue teams will be educated previously in the week, when energy books are higher as well as you might should educate them much more or much less than other muscle groups, relying on your recovery ability. If you have a weak muscle mass team that could recuperate quicker, you could train that muscle group much more frequently.

On the flip side, if you have a muscle mass group that recoups slower, much less frequent workouts for that muscle team would certainly be most ideal. Delts as well as arms tend to be muscular tissue groups that individuals overtrain with uniformity. If you locate your arms aren’t responding along with you would certainly such as, deal with need to train them much more regularly and also in fact cut back on arm work. You may be amazed to see brand-new growth.

3 CHOOSE WHAT WORKS

You need to utilize workouts that really feel ideal as well as fit your body as well as particular construct. No matter if your buddies inform you that you need to do a particular exercise to obtain huge. If it does not really feel right and also it isn’t excavating right into the muscular tissue like it should, do refrain that exercise. Not everybody is constructed for the exact same workouts. Some individuals can squat as well as target their quads and make unbelievable progression, yet others can squat for many years and not advance much in any way. You don’t need to squat to have fantastic legs. Find what help you via experimentation. Do not do a workout that isn’t helping you.

4 FIND YOUR RANGE

Volume is usually dictated by recuperation capability. Anyone could do 20 sets of back, but if that quantity is also much and you aren’t going to recuperate from that kind of work, it would certainly be a wild-goose chase to do it. It will certainly be to your benefit to exercise with different associate plans for a predetermined size of time and afterwards evaluate, based on development, which associate varies function the very best for you. The various other alternative is to transform your rep pattern to maintain the body off balance. You could do this from workout to exercise or perhaps within the very same exercise. Selection is exceptionally important when trying to cause the body to adjust to stimulations that it isn’t utilized to.

5 INTENSITY

This one is very important because when you first begin, you do not need to push the strength all that difficult as well as you’ll still make terrific gains. When those initial gains sluggish, you’re going to wish to look for methods to keep strength high. Intensity develops muscular tissue as well as constructs physiques. It’s the level of initiative in the health club that produces terrific progression, as well as yet you have to keep that solidified by not educating also hard, beyond your healing capabilities, or development can involve a shrilling stop. There many strength methods to make use of, and a few of the prominent methods are:

  • Dropsets: After falling short with a particular weight, make the weight lighter and also right away proceed the set to failure again.
  • Rest-pause sets: After you fail, rack the weight for 30 secs then go after a couple of even more associates to failure.
  • Forced reps: Your partner aids you get an additional one or two representatives after you fail.
  • Decrease the time between collections: If you normally rest 90 seconds between sets, reducing that rest time in half will typically reduce your toughness down a bit for the following sets, but if strength is higher, the decrease in strength because of tiredness serves. The muscular tissue does not know just what the weight is, it only knows the need being placed on the muscle.
  • Change rep tempos: Be eruptive someday and really regulated as well as methodical the following, or do the positive section of the rep swiftly and afterwards slow down the unfavorable section. Even subtle changes in representative pace could give a brand-new stimulus that causes adaptation. Adjustment equals growth.

Although there are a broad range of variables associated with programming your best exercise, the five listed above will certainly be a great beginning to making your exercises extra efficient. Be structured, yet be adaptable with your plan. Have a factor for doing every point you perform in the gym. If you can not respond to the inquiry, “Why am I doing this?” then you ought not to be doing it. No person will certainly get big or ripped without a solid, configuring construct. It hasn’t already took place yet, and also you won’t be the. FLEX
